easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I am not a pet, but I can tell you what time it is. What am I?
easy.a: A clock or a clock hand
easy.hint: It points to hours and minutes.

medium.q: I am a number. If you double me and then add four, you get sixteen. What number am I?
medium.hint: Think backward from 16: what times 2 plus 4 gives 16?
